channel.title: Patric Fornasier on World Wide Webber
channel.description: Recent content in Patric Fornasier on World Wide Webber

item.title: Soya: a Programming Model and Runtime Environment for Component Composition using SSDL
item.description: An implementation of SSDL tooling and an empirical demonstration of how developers can readily use SSDL to build robust services and systems of services.
